turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm trying to place an order at at the Starbucks at 6th and Congress in Austin, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Think I want to try the cafe Americano.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And can I get it with an extra short?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, would you like any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your venti Americano with extra shot will be ready for pickup soon at the Starbucks on 5th and congress.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 6th and Congress but all right. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, 6th and congress, thanks for correcting that.
